```{r updating orig.ident with sample+condition_celltype for FindMarkers function}
metadata <- seurat_subset@meta.data
metadata$orig.ident <- paste(metadata$condition, metadata$C_scANVI, sep = "_")
Idents(seurat_subset) <- metadata$orig.ident
seurat_subset@meta.data <- metadata
print(head(seurat_subset@meta.data))
```
```{r function for gender specific DEG}
DEG_analysis <- function(gender_ko, gender_wt, cell_type, gender) {
  # Define variables
  ko_ident <- paste0(gender_ko, "_", cell_type)
  wt_ident <- paste0(gender_wt, "_", cell_type)
  title <- paste0(cell_type, paste0(": DEGs in KO vs. WT for ", gender, " samples"))
  unfiltered_csv <- file.path(out_path, paste0("/tables/", gender, "_", cell_type, "_integrated_KO_DEGs_nmt.csv"))
  plot_png <- file.path(out_path, paste0("/plots/", gender, "_", cell_type, "_integrated_KO_DEGs.pdf"))
  upregulated_csv <- file.path(out_path, paste0("/tables/", gender, "_", cell_type, "_integrated_upregulated_KO_DEGs_nmt.csv"))
  downregulated_csv <- file.path(out_path, paste0("/tables/", gender, "_", cell_type, "_integrated_downregulated_KO_DEGs_nmt.csv"))

  # Find markers
  markers <- FindMarkers(seurat_subset, ident.1 = ko_ident, ident.2 = wt_ident, verbose = TRUE)
  write.csv(markers, unfiltered_csv)
  df <- markers

  # Plot DEGs
  significance_filter <- 0.05
  FC_threshold <- 0.5
  Vol_DEG <- EnhancedVolcano(df,
    rownames(df),
    x = "avg_log2FC",
    y = "p_val_adj",
    pCutoff = significance_filter,
    FCcutoff = FC_threshold,
    pointSize = 4,              # Larger, more visible points
    labSize = 8.0,                # Larger gene labels
    axisLabSize = 18,             # Larger axis labels
    titleLabSize = 20,            # Larger title
    subtitleLabSize = 16,         # Larger subtitle
    captionLabSize = 14,          # Larger caption
    drawConnectors = TRUE,
    widthConnectors = 0.5,        # Thicker connector lines
    title = title,
    xlim = c(-2.5, 2.5),              # Zoom in on x-axis
    ylim = c(0, 4),              # More zoomed in y-axis
    colAlpha = 0.8,               # Slight transparency for overlapping points
    gridlines.major = FALSE,      # Cleaner look
    gridlines.minor = FALSE
  )
  ggsave(plot_png, plot = Vol_DEG, width = 10.1, height = 10.1)

  # Subset up and downregulated DEGs
  upregulated_KO_DEGs <- subset(markers, p_val_adj < 0.01 & avg_log2FC > 1)
  write.csv(upregulated_KO_DEGs, upregulated_csv)

  downregulated_KO_DEGs <- subset(markers, p_val_adj < 0.01 & avg_log2FC < -1)
  write.csv(downregulated_KO_DEGs, downregulated_csv)
}
# run the function: params - sample_KO, sample_WT, cell_type (Fast IIX, Fast IIB, FAPs, Skeleton MuSc), Female/Male
DEG_analysis("KO", "WT", "Fast IIB", "Male")
```

```{r function for generating feature plots}
# Function to generate feature plots for a specific object type
plot_feature_for_object <- function(condition_obj_list, plot_str, obj_type, features, out_path) {
  # Generate the feature plot
  p <- FeaturePlot(condition_obj_list[[obj_type]],
    features = features,
    min.cutoff = "q10",
    max.cutoff = "q90",
    ncol = 1
  )

  # Save the plot
  ggsave(file.path(out_path, paste0("/plots/", plot_str, obj_type, "_cells.png")),
    plot = p,
    width = 12,
    height = 6,
    dpi = 300
  )
}
```

```{r function for generating heatmaps}
# Function to generate feature plots for a specific object type
plot_heat_for_object <- function(object, obj_type, features, out_path) {
  # scale data for these features
  object <- ScaleData(object, features = features)
  # plot heatmap
  p <- DoHeatmap(
    object = object, features = features,
    group.by = "ident"
  )
  # Save the plot
  ggsave(file.path(out_path, paste0("/plots/heat_interest_", obj_type, "_cells.png")),
    plot = p,
    width = 12,
    height = 6,
    dpi = 300
  )
}
heatmap_markers <- c("Cdkn1a", "Myh8", "Col19a1", "Lrrk2", "Eda2r", "Atp2a1")
# Plot for KO cells
plot_heat_for_object(condition_muscle_obj_list$WT, "WT", heatmap_markers, out_path)
```
